Detailed Description

cvmx_dfm_rlevel_rank#

Notes: This is TWO CSRs per DFM, one per each rank.

Deskew setting is measured in units of 1/4 FCLK, so the above BYTE* values can range over 16 FCLKs.

Each CSR is written by HW during a read-leveling sequence for the rank. (HW sets STATUS==3 after HW read-leveling completes for the rank.) If HW is unable to find a match per DFM_RLEVEL_CTL[OFFSET_EN] and DFM_RLEVEL_CTL[OFFSET], then HW will set DFM_RLEVEL_RANKn[BYTE*<5:0>] to 0.

Each CSR may also be written by SW, but not while a read-leveling sequence is in progress. (HW sets STATUS==1 after a CSR write.)

SW initiates a HW read-leveling sequence by programming DFM_RLEVEL_CTL and writing INIT_START=1 with SEQUENCE=1 in DFM_CONFIG. See DFM_RLEVEL_CTL.
